SELECT SEQ_TRA.nextval AS tra_id from DUAL
INSERT INTO T_TRAIN(TRA_ID, TRA_THEME, TRA_CONTENT, TRA_OBJ, TRA_BEGINTIME, TRA_ENDTIME, TRA_ADDRESS, TRA_STATE) VALUES (#{tra_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{tra_theme,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tra_content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{tra_obj,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{tra_begintime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tra_endtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{tra_address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{tra_state,jdbcType=INTEGER})
